pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Kiro is an AI-powered Integrated Development Environment (IDE) based on Visual Studio Code that helps developers turn ideas into production code through spec-driven development. Built on the Electron framework, Kiro provides modern code editing capabilities with AI assistance for enhanced productivity.
Features include: - AI-powered code completion and generation - Spec-driven development workflow - Modern code editor with syntax highlighting - Integrated terminal and debugging tools - Extension marketplace compatibility - Git integration - Multi-language support
